abstract: One case of rare laryngeal tumor--adenoid cystic carcinoma in 58 year old woman was reported in this paper. Authors wanted to drew attention to few complaints and only slight dysphagia in comparison to local extensiveness of the neoplasm. Diagnostic difficulties were underline. Epidemiology, clinical course and therapy were demonstrated in laryngeal adenoid cystic carcinoma.
title: [A rare case of adenoid cystic carcinoma of the larynx].
